title: 3D Marble Flip (2002)
description:
Title:      3d Marble Flip                                                                                     
                                                            Protection: none                                              
          Ripper:     secret                                                                                             
                                    instructions: mount/burn, play                                                        
                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                          
          website:   <a href=" http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/3d-marble-flip" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/3d-marble-flip</a>                                               
                                                                              .stolen from the dollar menu                
         Released:   2002                                                                                               
                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                         
                                           Company:    Cosmi                                                            
                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                          
                system requirements: Windows '98 or higher, xp compatible                                                
                                 Mouse Required,                                                                         
              rippers test reveals this game does not work on windows 7 beta, also doesn't work in kubuntu/wine          
                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                          
              3D Marble Flip is based on marble labyrinth games. The game contains a series of                            
             mazes that grow gradually more complex and even lethal to your marble. For                                   
                       each maze, the player must tilt the board in any direction in order to make the                   
                                                                                                                         
         marble roll. The goal is to collect items on the board and then get to the finishing                             
                    pit. Finish the board in the allotted time limit and avoid any traps, like falling off               
        into the void.
